attributes.action: MP’s should NOT be allowed to claim expenses for heating.
attributes.additional_details: Parliament should never be saying DO AS I SAY, NOT AS I DO!
attributes.background: As they have stopped subsidies, I.e, Winter fuel Allowance, it makes MP’s look hypocritical.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out more about IPSA here: https://www.theipsa.org.uk/

You may wish to sign this petition calling for a review of MP’s expenses:

Review the system of expenses and allowances for MPs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702821
